value_id.description: The official gene identifier as designated by the organism gene nomenclature committee e.g. HGNC:3477 or MGI:2385071 This should be a CURIE linking the reference to a namespace where it can be retrieved. Mirrors the value_id field of a generic value object descriptor

symbol.description: The primary gene symbol. Takes the place of the label field in a generic descriptor

description.description: A free-text description of the value object

alternate_ids.description: Alternate IDs (should be CURIE) for the same concept may be placed in alternate_ids

alternate_symbols.description: Takes the place of alternate_labels field in a generic descriptor

xrefs.description: Related concept IDs (e.g. gene ortholog IDs) may be placed in xrefs
